Trade/Device Name(s): Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB® Test) Assay Verification Set
Inverness Medical Innovations, Inc. Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB®) Assay Verification Set (AVS)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB®) Assay Verification Set used to verify accuracy of the ACB Test on designated Roche analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for verifying the accuracy of the ACB Test on Roche INTEGRA 700/800, Roche/Hitachi 917, and Roche MODULAR P as part of assay installation for in vitro diagnostic use.
